contentfulPagePressRelease.title: HBKU Honors Alfardan Group for its Contribution to the HBKU Scholarship Program

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Hamad bin Khalifa University (HBKU) held a dinner on 14 April to honor the Alfardan Group for its ongoing contribution and support to the HBKU Scholarship program.

Three students from HBKU’s partner universities were awarded scholarships from Alfardan Group’s contribution, namely from Texas A&M University at Qatar (TAMUQ) and Carnegie Mellon University in Qatar (CMU-Q).

The HBKU Scholarship program was established and designed to nurture potential, recognize excellence and support students enrolled at HBKU or one of its partner universities.

In the past, HBKU has partnered with key local and regional organizations including the Ali Bin Ali Group and ITOCHU for the HBKU Scholarship program.

For the full story, please click here.
